  • Method Details

    • getSingleNonNullMixedOrThrow

      public static String getSingleNonNullMixedOrThrow(ANY any)
      Returns the single non-blank string of the xmlMixed parameter of an ANY instance. If no string or more than one strings are present, the method throws an exception.
      Parameters:
      any - The ANY instance.
      Returns:
      the single non-blank string from xmlMixed.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if there is zero or more than one xmlMixed value.

    • getSingleNullableMixedOrThrow

      public static @Nullable String getSingleNullableMixedOrThrow(@Nullable ANY any)
      Returns the single non-blank string of the xmlMixed parameter of an ANY instance. If no string is present, null is returned and if more than one strings are present, the method throws an exception.
      Parameters:
      any - The ANY instance or null.
      Returns:
      the single non-blank string from xmlMixed or null.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if there is more than one xmlMixed value.

    • getContentSection

      @SideEffectFree public static Optional<POCDMT000040Section> getContentSection(POCDMT000040ClinicalDocument cce)
      Returns the content section (that contains the item entries).
      Returns:
      the content section.

    • toEmedReference

      public static EmedReference toEmedReference(POCDMT000040Supply supply)
      Constructs a new eMed reference from a Supply reference.
      Parameters:
      supply - The Supply element.
      Returns:
      the created eMed reference.
      Throws:
      InvalidEmedContentException - if the CCE document is invalid.

    • toEmedReference

      public static EmedReference toEmedReference(POCDMT000040Observation observation) throws InvalidEmedContentException
      Constructs a new eMed reference from an Observation reference.
      Parameters:
      observation - The Observation element.
      Returns:
      the created eMed reference.
      Throws:
      InvalidEmedContentException - if the CCE document is invalid.

    • toEmedReference

      public static EmedReference toEmedReference(POCDMT000040SubstanceAdministration substanceAdministration) throws InvalidEmedContentException
      Constructs a new eMed reference from a SubstanceAdministration reference.
      Parameters:
      substanceAdministration - The SubstanceAdministration element.
      Returns:
      the created eMed reference.
      Throws:
      InvalidEmedContentException - if the CCE document is invalid.
